snippet: The plot of the Amazon-Hachette battle over ebook prices just acquired a strange literary twist....

headline.print_headline: Amazon Picks on Orwell in Latest Ebook Salvo Against Hachette
headline.main: Amazon Picks on Orwell in Latest Ebook Salvo Against Hachette

lead_paragraph: The plot of the Amazon-Hachette battle over ebook prices just acquired a strange literary twist.
